msbt.message: Hmmmm... Yes, yes... It had to be, right? There's no way to make that movie without computerized images. <20_3 arg="6" />Ah!! How long have you been there?! I'm sorry, I was just lost in thought.

But if he's the real hero, what does that mean for the movie's ending? There has to be a sequel, right?<20_2 arg="6" />Ahh! Oh dear.<20_3 arg="6" /> I didn't see you there. I'm mulling over something very important, so let's talk later.

How much did that movie set cost? It was so gorgeous! Let's see... This, plus that...carry the three...<20_2 arg="6" />Aaaah!! You scared me!<20_3 arg="6" /> I'm sorry, I'm deep in thought with important calculations. We'll talk later, OK?
